context: In a simple model, often referred to as the <a0_0>transmission model<a0_0/> or standard view of communication, information or content (e.g. <a1_0>a message in <b8_0>natural language<b8_0/><a1_0/>) is sent in some form (as <a2_0>spoken language<a2_0/>) <a3_0>from an emisor/ sender/ encoder<a3_0/> to a <b7_0>destination/ receiver/ decoder<b7_0/>. This common conception of communication simply views communication as a means of sending and receiving information.
